name: 陳涵秀
objective: This course aims to understand the concept of cultural preservation, and the methods of doing cultural preservation by examining different case studies in the world. Different issues related to cultural preservation are also discussed in this course, include the value and authenticity of cultural heritage, the representation and interpretation of culture, and reuse and management of cultural spaces. A creative practice of cultural preservation will be conducted in this course.
schedule:
1. Ｗhat is culture?
2. About cultural preservation，conservation, restoration.
3. The development of cultural preservation policy 
4. The authenticity and value of cultural preservation.
5. The intangible heritage preservation  
6. Field trip 
7. The case studies of cultural preservation and creative practice in Taiwan
8. The international case studies of cultural preservation and creative practice 
9. Mid term: Oral presentation
10. Film screen  
11. Personal fieldwork practice 
12. Oral presentation for personal fieldwork
13. Method of fieldwork I Introduction 
14. Method of fieldwork II Observation 
15. Field trip 
16. Method of fieldwork III Interview 
17. External lecturer’s talk
18. Oral presentation of cultural preservation and creative practice
